thread.title: BRIEF-Denali Therapeutics, Lonza Pharma & Biotech Announce Exclusive Partnership To Develop And Produce Biologic Medicines

title: BRIEF-Denali Therapeutics, Lonza Pharma & Biotech Announce Exclusive Partnership To Develop And Produce Biologic Medicines

organizations.name: develop and produce biologic medicines reuters

text:
February 8, 2018 / 2:26 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Denali Therapeutics, Lonza Pharma & Biotech Announce Exclusive Partnership To Develop And Produce Biologic Medicines Reuters Staff 
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Denali Therapeutics Inc: 
* DENALI THERAPEUTICS AND LONZA PHARMA & BIOTECH ANNOUNCE EXCLUSIVE PARTNERSHIP TO DEVELOP AND PRODUCE BIOLOGIC MEDICINES 
* DENALI THERAPEUTICS INC - PARTNERSHIP WITH LONZA PHARMA & BIOTECH AIMS TO DEVELOP DRUGS FOR NEURODEGENERATIVE DISEASES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
